game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is plagued by an eternal winter and creatures twisted by darkness.
game.ending: The player must face their greatest foe yet in an epic battle to determine the fate of the realm.
game.synopsis: A young orphan named Eira sets out on a quest to find the lost city of El'goroth, where ancient magic once thrived. Along the way, she discovers her own connection to the forgotten arts and rallies a group of unlikely allies to join her against an encroaching darkness that threatens to consume everything.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
